headline: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn's board meeting on Nov 14, 2016
description: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on November 14, 2016, to consider, approve and adopt the Un-Audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on September 30, 2016.
articleBody: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on November 14, 2016, to transact the following business:1. To consider, approve and adopt the Un-Audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on September 30, 2016.2. To consider the progress of the Company particularly in regard to Capacity utilisation and recovery from debtors.3. To consider the status at BIFR.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Shri Lakshmi Co

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn: Outcome of board meeting
description: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn Ltd has authorised the Chairman to approve the draft of Notice of Annual General Meeting &amp; to fix date, time and venue of Annual General Meeting.
articleBody: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 30, 2016 at 03:30 p.m. have considered and decided the following:-1. Authorised the Chairman to approve the draft of Notice of Annual General Meeting &amp; to fix date, time and venue of Annual General Meeting.2. Reviewed and noted the status of BIFR.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Shri Lakshmi Co

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn's board meeting on May 30, 2016
description: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on May 30, 2016, to consider and approve the Audited Financial Results for the quarter/year ended on March 31, 2016.
articleBody: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on May 30, 2016, inter alia, to transact the following business:1. To consider and approve the Audited Financial Results for the quarter/year ended on March 31, 2016.2. To authorize the Chairman to approve the draft of Notice of Annual General Meeting, fixing date, time and venue of Annual General Meeting.3. To consider the status at BIFR.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Shri Lakshmi Co

headline: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn: Outcome of board meeting
description: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn in its meeting held on November 14, 2015, have considered and decided and Considered and noted the exit from the Corporate Debt Restructuring (CDR) by the lender banks. Considered and noted the present status at Board for Industrial and Financial Restructuring (BIFR).
articleBody: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on November 14, 2015, inter alia, have considered and decided the following:-1. Considered and noted the exit from the Corporate Debt Restructuring (CDR) by the lender banks.2. headline: ShriShri Lakshmi Cotsyn board meeting on May 30, 2015
description: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn's board meeting will be held on May 30, 2015,  to transact the business and consider, approve and adopt the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the financial year ended on March 31, 2015.
articleBody: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on May 30, 2015, inter alia, to transact the following business:1. To consider, approve and adopt the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the financial year ended on March 31, 2015.1. To consider the status of Corporate Debt Restructuring (CDR) and Board for Industrial and Financial Reconstruction (BIFR).3. To re-consider the issuance of 1,62,32,914 no's of equity share / share warrant on preferential basis.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Shri Lakshmi Co

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn's board meet on March 15, 2014
description: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn management has fixed the date of Board Meeting on March 15, 2014 at 3:30 P.M after obtaining the Un-audited Financial Results, duly reviewed by the Audit Committee Meeting at their meeting on the same date at 10:30 A.M.
articleBody: With reference to the earlier annoucement dated February 14, 2014, through which the Company had informed about postponement of the Board meeting after two weeks i.e. February 28, 2014 at 3:30 P.M. at the Registered Office of theCompany for the purpose of approval of Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter / six months ended on December 31, 2013, Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn Ltd has now informed BSE that the members of the Audit Committee of the Company could not be present on date for the meeting, due to which approval of Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the aforesaid quarter could not take place.However, the Company have been informed by the Independent Directors that they will be available at Kanpuron March 15, 2014 on occasion of ‘Holi’ festival and proposed the date of Audit Committee Meeting on March 15, 2014. Accordingly, the Management has fixed the date of Board Meeting on March 15, 2014 at 3:30 P.M after obtaining the Un-audited Financial Results, duly reviewed by the Audit Committee Meeting at their meeting on the same date at 10:30 A.M.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Shri Lakshmi Co

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn board meeting postponed
description: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn has informed that the meeting of the board of directors which was scheduled to be held on February 14, 2014 has been postponed by two weeks in view of the non-availability of duly reviewed un-audited financial results from audit committee of the company.
articleBody: Shri Lakshmi Cotsyn Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors which was scheduled to be held on February 14, 2014 at 3:30 P.M. at the Registered Office of the Company for the purpose of approval of Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter/ six months ended on December 31, 2013, has been postponed by two weeks in view of the non-availability of duly reviewed un-audited Financial results from Audit Committee of the Company as Audit Committee Meeting could not be held due to the absence of their requisite quorum.The next date of the Board Meeting will be informed in due course.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Shri Lakshmi Co
